name: Destroy The Destroyed
description:
Collect fyutoplasma to travel in time. Fight with corporation Zalagah in past to save traditions and return happiness to people. Upgrade your weapon, to be stronger and to defeat more corporation Zalagah workers.

Note:
There is no saving in the game, so if you start playing you have to finish it or if you fully close the game, you will have to start from beginning.
There is no tutorial in the game, so how to play will be described below.

How to play?
  1. You need to collect fyutoplasma, to do it click on the table continuously.
  2. Once you have enough fyutoplasma (the backpack's energy bar will fill up, and a time warp button will appear), you can press on the button and time warp to past.
  3. Now, to fight you have two controls - by pressing on the left side of the screen you will dodge an attack from enemy, and by pressing on the right side of the screen you will do an attack.
  4. You can upgrade your weapon in the upgrade machine (it's located on the left side in the apartment), once you have opened it you can buy upgrades by spending fyukribucks, which you will get from defeating enemies.
